ModMetaData.name: Growable Grass - B18
ModMetaData.author: frenchiveruti
ModMetaData.description:
Mod Version: 18.00.02.00 Simple mod that allows the user to plant grass for his animals.
Changes for v18.00.02.00 Instroduced ModCheck. ModCheck will now look out for Vegetable Garden and RF Wild Planting. If found will trigger error.
